description: Commands like nova-manage image convert have no documentation that I've found. Please write RST that explains the uses for the commands and the arguments available for nova-manage image ...
title: Need documentation for nova-manage image ... commands

comments.content: Commands like nova-manage image convert have no documentation that I've found. Please write RST that explains the uses for the commands and the arguments available for nova-manage image ...
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~annegentle

comments.content:
isn't that documented on the man page (doc/source/man/novamanage.rst) ?  or are you asking for more detail ?
this is where you told us to document it when we asked last.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ken-pepple

comments.content: There's some fairly basic docs in novamanage.rst as Ken points out. Does that suffice, Anne?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~markmc

comments.content:
My guess is that the section "Using the nova-manage command" in
http://docs.openstack.org/trunk/openstack-compute/admin/content/managing-the-cloud.html

could be extended with content from nova-manage.rst, or a note added to simply encourage people to run "man nova-manage"
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~fifieldt

comments.content: Assuming it does suffice and nothing needs to be done on Nova's side. Please set back to Confirmed if it doesn't
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/8090
Committed: http://github.com/openstack/openstack-manuals/commit/09c68d4d08fb1d7ace91f35ac4e02521ef731104
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 09c68d4d08fb1d7ace91f35ac4e02521ef731104
Author: Tom Fifield <email address hidden>
Date:   Sun Jun 3 10:38:02 2012 +1000

    Slight fleshing of nova-manage doc
    
    This is perhaps a stop-gap change until the proper CLI doc is in
    place. As most commandline use is moving towards nova client, rather
    than nova-manage simply extending
    the phrasing a little and encouraging users to read the man page.
    
    Placing nova client first, based on feedback
    
    fixes bug 766703
    
    Second patch - addresses concerns from previous patches about leading
    with novaclient, and emphasising that nova-manage is only for
    administrators.
    
    Change-Id: Id94fe752a86c0e6c6ebeb2ed88a2f7526716f854
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
